Review: I bought this phone last month and the battery life is incredible. Easily lasts 2 days!
The delivery was delayed by over a week. I needed this urgently and it was a big letdown.
Packaging was excellent and the product works as expected. Definitely recommend it.
The customer service agent was not helpful and kept transferring my call. Very poor support.
I love this product! It’s sleek, durable, and performs better than advertised.
Item arrived damaged and the return process was complicated. Not satisfied.
Setup instructions were clear and everything was in the box. Worked like a charm.
I expected more for the price I paid. It's just average in terms of performance.
Fast delivery and amazing follow-up service from the seller.
Received the wrong color variant even after selecting correctly. Disappointed.
Had a problem with one of the parts, but support shipped a replacement quickly.
The audio quality is subpar, especially in noisy environments.
My issue was resolved within 24 hours of raising a ticket. Great service!
This product is not compatible with older devices, which should have been mentioned.
Very poor packaging. The box was torn and the seal was broken.
Everything was as expected. Good quality, timely delivery, and great price.
The device heats up too quickly even during moderate use. Disappointed.
One of the best purchases I’ve made this year. Works perfectly with all accessories.
The packaging was okay, but it lacked bubble wrap. Could’ve been safer.
Impressed by the after-sales service. They replaced my charger without hassle.
